info.name: Consents-Blockchain-2.x - Consents & SubSystems
info.description:
Explore extensions and applicability of Blockchain to guarantee integrity and traceability of private data.

Contact Support:
 Email: francis.charette-migneault@crim.ca

request.description: Obtain full details of blocks that constitute a blockchain.
Obtain the details of a specific block within a blockchain.

request.description: Resolve a blockchain with other registered nodes with consensus.

exec: Update parts that must be separated by CRLF instead of LF.
Employ literal replacement block to avoid assuming which newlines to replace.
// in case of visual represenation newlines, also replace them along literal CRLF replacements

body.raw:
--simpleboundary
Content-Type: application/json; charset=UTF-8
Content-ID: meta

<CRLF><CRLF>

{
    "action": "share-data",
    "consent": true,
    "expire": "2050-01-01T08:00:00",
    "subsystems": [
        {
            "data_id": "PROFILE-IMAGE",
            "data_type": "image",
            "data_provider": "Best Social Media Plaform",
            "data_source": "https://best.social.media.com"
        },
        {
            "data": "user-name",
            "data_type": "text",
            "data_description": "other literal metadata without associated part",
            "media_type": "text/plain"
        }
    ]
}

<CRLF>

--simpleboundary
Content-Type: image/png; base64
Content-Description: profile image
Content-ID: PROFILE-IMAGE

<CRLF><CRLF>

iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAZAAAAGQCAYAAAC

<CRLF>

--simpleboundary--
<CRLF>

request.description: Resolve a blockchain with other registered nodes with consensus.
Obtain the list of blocks that constitute a blockchain.
Mine a blockchain to generate a new transaction block.
Create a new transaction on the blockchain.
Resolve a blockchain with other registered nodes with consensus.

response.name: Resolved blockchain following consensus with other nodes.
Generated missing blockchain retrieved from other nodes.
Resolved blockchain with only Genesis Block
Resolved blockchain with 3 blocks
